Entries.DialogueText: Sales have been plummeting! Where have all my customers gone? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sales have been plummeting! Where have all my customers gone?

Entries.DialogueText: Waa..?!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Waa..?!

Entries.DialogueText: All my customers...Here?!? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: All my customers...Here?!?

Entries.DialogueText: This isn't good... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: This isn't good...

Entries.DialogueText: Hmmph!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmmph!

Entries.DialogueText: It's of no consequence! I'll just run a 75%-off sale and all my customers will come crawling back to me, begging for forgiveness! You'll see! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's of no consequence! I'll just run a 75%-off sale and all my customers will come crawling back to me, begging for forgiveness! You'll see!

Entries.DialogueText: I'm done for... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm done for...

Entries.DialogueText: Morris and his JojaMart cronies were never heard from again...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Morris and his JojaMart cronies were never heard from again...

Entries.DialogueText: There he is, everyone! Look sharp!
Entries.DisplayPattern: There he is, everyone! Look sharp!

Entries.DialogueText: There she is, everyone! Look sharp!
Entries.DisplayPattern: There she is, everyone! Look sharp!

Entries.DialogueText: *Ahem*...
Entries.DisplayPattern: *Ahem*...

Entries.DialogueText: Just a few short years ago, the great innovators at Joja Headquarters came up with a new idea, the Joja Community Development Project.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Just a few short years ago, the great innovators at Joja Headquarters came up with a new idea, the Joja Community Development Project.

Entries.DialogueText: The project was conceived as a way to provide important construction services to the beloved communities we hold so dear...*sniff*... all while generating substantial revenue!
Entries.DisplayPattern: The project was conceived as a way to provide important construction services to the beloved communities we hold so dear...*sniff*... all while generating substantial revenue!

Entries.DialogueText: Pelican Town, with its run-down infrastructure, was a perfect testing ground.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Pelican Town, with its run-down infrastructure, was a perfect testing ground.

Entries.DialogueText: Well, thanks to you, our Community Development Pilot Program has been a major success!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, thanks to you, our Community Development Pilot Program has been a major success!

Entries.DialogueText: From repairing old bridges, to fixing buses, to turning piles of rubble into a greenhouse, we've really turned this city around!
Entries.DisplayPattern: From repairing old bridges, to fixing buses, to turning piles of rubble into a greenhouse, we've really turned this city around!

Entries.DialogueText: I've also received a big promotion! Hehehe.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've also received a big promotion! Hehehe.

Entries.DialogueText: The president of the company asked me to give you this exclusive gift as a way of saying 'thanks'.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The president of the company asked me to give you this exclusive gift as a way of saying 'thanks'.

Entries.DialogueText: Ahem...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ahem...

Entries.DialogueText: Come and get it folks... coupons for 50% off your purchase at JojaMart!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Come and get it folks... coupons for 50% off your purchase at JojaMart!

Entries.DialogueText: Well? Any takers?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well? Any takers?

Entries.DialogueText: It must be so difficult for you... To lose your loyal customers like that.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It must be so difficult for you... To lose your loyal customers like that.

Entries.DialogueText: But can you blame them? Joja Corporation is clearly the superior choice. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But can you blame them? Joja Corporation is clearly the superior choice.

Entries.DialogueText: Soon the whole town will realize that.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Soon the whole town will realize that.

Entries.DialogueText: Sigh... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sigh...

Entries.DialogueText: Hah!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hah!

Entries.DialogueText: This means nothing. I'll just run a 75%-off sale and all my customers will come crawling back to me, begging for forgiveness. You'll see! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: This means nothing. I'll just run a 75%-off sale and all my customers will come crawling back to me, begging for forgiveness. You'll see!

Entries.DialogueText: Oh? And how do you propose we do that? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh? And how do you propose we do that?

Entries.DialogueText: Hah! Primitive...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hah! Primitive...

Entries.DialogueText: Insult me all you like... but don't you DARE slander the good name of Joja! {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Insult me all you like... but don't you DARE slander the good name of Joja!

Entries.DialogueText: You're even weaker than your fresh produce selection! {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You're even weaker than your fresh produce selection!

Entries.DialogueText: Excellent! Welcome to Joja Corporation! Come back tomorrow and we can see about getting started on some community development projects... Oh, and don't forget your wallet! Hehe.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Excellent! Welcome to Joja Corporation! Come back tomorrow and we can see about getting started on some community development projects... Oh, and don't forget your wallet! Hehe.

Entries.DialogueText: Now, let me call Mayor Lewis and see about gutting that nasty old community center...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Now, let me call Mayor Lewis and see about gutting that nasty old community center...

Entries.DialogueText: Come back tomorrow and we can see about getting some community improvements started... Just make sure to bring a lot of money. Hehe.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Come back tomorrow and we can see about getting some community improvements started... Just make sure to bring a lot of money. Hehe.

Entries.DialogueText: Welcome to JojaMart! How are you doing today?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Welcome to JojaMart! How are you doing today?

Entries.DialogueText: I don't believe we've met. I'm Morris, Joja Customer Satisfaction Representative.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't believe we've met. I'm Morris, Joja Customer Satisfaction Representative.

Entries.DialogueText: When you decide you want to become a Joja Member, I'll be delighted to help make your transition a joyous experience.
Entries.DisplayPattern: When you decide you want to become a Joja Member, I'll be delighted to help make your transition a joyous experience.

Entries.DialogueText: Welcome to JojaMart! How is your weekend going?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Welcome to JojaMart! How is your weekend going?

Entries.DialogueText: We're currently in the process of setting up a brand-new membership system for our customers. Please check back soon to join!
Entries.DisplayPattern: We're currently in the process of setting up a brand-new membership system for our customers. Please check back soon to join!

Entries.DialogueText: Welcome to JojaMart! How are you doing today?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Welcome to JojaMart! How are you doing today?

Entries.DialogueText: We're currently in the process of setting up a brand-new membership system for our customers. Please check back soon to join!
Entries.DisplayPattern: We're currently in the process of setting up a brand-new membership system for our customers. Please check back soon to join!

Entries.DialogueText: Welcome to JojaMart! How are you doing today?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Welcome to JojaMart! How are you doing today?

Entries.DialogueText: Unfortunately, due to unforeseen circumstances our Joja Membership offer is not currently available. I'm certain it will get sorted out soon!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Unfortunately, due to unforeseen circumstances our Joja Membership offer is not currently available. I'm certain it will get sorted out soon!

Entries.DialogueText: Welcome to JojaMart! How is your weekend going?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Welcome to JojaMart! How is your weekend going?

Entries.DialogueText: Unfortunately, due to unforeseen circumstances our Joja Membership offer is not currently available. I'm certain it will get sorted out soon!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Unfortunately, due to unforeseen circumstances our Joja Membership offer is not currently available. I'm certain it will get sorted out soon!

Entries.DialogueText: Membership costs {0}g. Well, would you like to join us?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Membership costs {0}g. Well, would you like to join us?

Entries.DialogueText: Yes.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yes.

Entries.DialogueText: No.
Entries.DisplayPattern: No.

Entries.DialogueText: Membership costs {0}g. Well, would you like to join us?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Membership costs {0}g. Well, would you like to join us?

Entries.DialogueText: Yes.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yes.

Entries.DialogueText: No.
Entries.DisplayPattern: No.

Entries.DialogueText: Welcome to JojaMart! How is your weekend going?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Welcome to JojaMart! How is your weekend going?

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm... Our records show that you live on a farm with some other folks... I'm sorry, but we can only sell a membership to the owner of your residence.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm... Our records show that you live on a farm with some other folks... I'm sorry, but we can only sell a membership to the owner of your residence.

Entries.DialogueText: Welcome to JojaMart! How are you doing today?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Welcome to JojaMart! How are you doing today?

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm... Our records show that you live on a farm with some other folks... I'm sorry, but we can only sell a membership to the owner of your residence.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm... Our records show that you live on a farm with some other folks... I'm sorry, but we can only sell a membership to the owner of your residence.

Entries.DialogueText: We're currently processing your last Community Development order. Please come back after the work is complete.
Entries.DisplayPattern: We're currently processing your last Community Development order. Please come back after the work is complete.

Entries.DialogueText: I've got the Joja Community Development Form right here for you, sir. Care to take a look?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've got the Joja Community Development Form right here for you, sir. Care to take a look?

Entries.DialogueText: Yes
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yes

Entries.DialogueText: No
Entries.DisplayPattern: No

Entries.DialogueText: I've got the Joja Community Development Form right here for you, miss. Care to take a look?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've got the Joja Community Development Form right here for you, miss. Care to take a look?

Entries.DialogueText: Yes
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yes

Entries.DialogueText: No
Entries.DisplayPattern: No

Entries.DialogueText: Excellent! We'll get our workers on it tonight. It should be ready for you by tomorrow.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Excellent! We'll get our workers on it tonight. It should be ready for you by tomorrow.

Entries.DialogueText: Yes
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yes

Entries.DialogueText: No
Entries.DisplayPattern: No

Entries.DialogueText: Half a mil...! {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Half a mil...!

Entries.DialogueText: *Ahem*... I mean... Excellent! Our Joja Construction Team will begin work on the new building tonight! Thank you for supporting our work.
Entries.DisplayPattern: *Ahem*... I mean... Excellent! Our Joja Construction Team will begin work on the new building tonight! Thank you for supporting our work.

Entries.DialogueText: Ah! My favorite customer... Unfortunately I have no more community development projects available at the moment.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah! My favorite customer... Unfortunately I have no more community development projects available at the moment.

Entries.DialogueText: Ah, {Farmer_Name}... My favorite Joja member.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah, ... My favorite Joja member.

Entries.DialogueText: You know, when I was first assigned to this location over %year years ago, I considered it a step back in my career.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You know, when I was first assigned to this location over %year years ago, I considered it a step back in my career.

Entries.DialogueText: What self-respecting Joja Manager would want to preside over a tiny, backwater location like Pelican Town? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: What self-respecting Joja Manager would want to preside over a tiny, backwater location like Pelican Town?

Entries.DialogueText: But I have to say, this valley has really grown on me, over the years.
Entries.DisplayPattern: But I have to say, this valley has really grown on me, over the years.

Entries.DialogueText: Working here has opened my eyes to a different way of life. It's hard to say this, but... It's been... a humbling experience.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Working here has opened my eyes to a different way of life. It's hard to say this, but... It's been... a humbling experience.

Entries.DialogueText: I just want to say, {Farmer_Name}... I appreciate all the hard work you've done for Joja Co.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I just want to say, ... I appreciate all the hard work you've done for Joja Co.

Entries.DialogueText: Our strength comes from our members, and you've shown exemplary drive and ingenuity. It makes me proud to work for the company. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Our strength comes from our members, and you've shown exemplary drive and ingenuity. It makes me proud to work for the company.

Entries.DialogueText: Welcome to JojaMart!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Welcome to JojaMart!
